title: Deputies surround Parkland shooter Nikolas Cruz after courtroom threat from potential juror - Fox News
content:
1. Deputies surround Parkland shooter Nikolas Cruz after courtroom threat from potential juror  Fox News
  2. Jury selection to start over after two weeks in court  WPBF 25 News
  3. Deputies protect Parkland shooter Nikolas Cruz in court after juror threat  New York Post
  4. Deputies protect Parkland school shooter during jury selection after pool member mouths possible threats  WPBF West Palm Beach
  5. Guards fear for Nikolas Cruz's safety during chaotic jury selection  WPTV News - FL Palm Beaches and Treasure Coast
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: What appeared to be a threat from a member of the jury pool led officers to surround and protect Parkland school shooter Nikolas Cruz out of concern that the incident could turn violent.
